messages.subject: intro/Alan Rickman
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/5/03 4:32:11 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/5/03 4:32:11 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< OT: I've got a question about Alan Rickman movies. I may be mistaken,
but
did someone in this group say that he was in a Robin Hood movie? >>

Yes, he was the very naughty Sheriff of Nottingham.....and SO sexy. It was
the version that Kevin Costner starred in ( and ruined).

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
